sentences.sentence: So even your mistakes can be monetized.
sentences.translation: 所以，甚至是你所犯的错误也可以作为你的摇钱树。

sentences.sentence: Most web apps will be monetized with some kind of media model.
sentences.translation: 大部分网页应用都是通过某种媒体模式来盈利的。

sentences.sentence: Entertaiment can be monetized through advertising and "freemium".
sentences.translation: 娱乐可以通过广告和“freemium”模式获得收益。
